br_cpu.name: the breadboard CPU project
br_cpu.quickdesc: The project where i design and build my own computer, from scratch, on breadboards.

design_first.name: the first designs
design_first.quickdesc: These are the first CPU designs i have made, from when i was still learning the basics of making a good CPU.

design_rev2.name: the design, revision 2
design_rev2.quickdesc: Designing GR8CPU, from one revision to another.

screening_cpus.name: screening CPUs... wait...
screening_cpus.quickdesc: Making the screen required to play Tic-Tac-Toe and to use some other programs, all on my breadboard CPU!

ideas.name: my ideas for future projects
ideas.quickdesc: In here, i will occasionally post ideas of projects i might want to make.

website.name: the ultimate website!
website.quickdesc:
It's this very website!
In this project i describe exactly how i set up everything required for the website.

mqtt_setup.name: setting up MQTT
mqtt_setup.quickdesc: Simple guide of how to set up and connect various MQTT devices.

garage.name: the automatic garage opener
garage.quickdesc: Using a bit of MQTT, electronics, and magic, we made an IOT garage opener!
